_doc_id.Concept: Friday time-window absolute percent move (07:30→14:00 CT)
_doc_id.Indicator_Computation: Compute % change between price at 07:30 CT and 14:00 CT on Fridays (convert to broker time via offsets).
_doc_id.Signal_Logic: After 14:00, if abs(%Δ) >= threshold, emit one-shot LONG if Δ>0, SHORT if Δ<0. Guard prevents re-fire.
_doc_id.Notes: Map abs %Δ to sizing scalar if desired; pair with risk regime filter.

_doc_id.Signal_Logic: Enable risk-off plays (long JPY/CHF, short AUD/NZD) when VIX_Z >= z_th; apply hysteresis to avoid churn.
_doc_id.Notes: Gate entries; combine with correlation stability monitor.

_doc_id.Concept: Positioning Ratio Index (institutional vs retail blend)
_doc_id.Indicator_Computation: Weighted blend of COT net z, retail long/short ratio (z), and inst–retail divergence (z).
_doc_id.Signal_Logic: Use oscillator bands: PRI >= +1 → contrarian short bias; PRI <= −1 → contrarian long bias; neutral otherwise.
